snippet.title: Legend of Dungeon - 4 Player Co-Op Gameplay
snippet.description:
As we prepare for something of an Indie Special in next week's episode here's a little something to whet you appetite. Watch as the entire Killer Bits crew (including myself) descend into the depths with - Legend of Dungeon.

For more information about Legend of Dungeon head over to the developer's website at http://robotloveskitty.com/LoD/ and checkout their Steam Greenlight page - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=108895757. And if you are heading to PAX East 2013 why not stop by booth #191 and say "hi" to the RobotLovesKitty guys in person.

To keep in touch with the show follow us on Twitter (http://www.twitter.com/thekillerbits) and Facebook (http://www.facebook.com/thekillerbits)

Produced by Icarus Films (UK)  http://www.icarus-films.co.uk
Music by Forte Sounds  http://www.fortesounds.com

Special thanks to:
Alienware (http://www.alienware.com)
